Quickstrike:




Quickstrike kept himself from the vision of the others. He kept his voice 
low as he replied to Megatron, "Well, ah got uh idea boss. Ah sent out two 
bots lookin' fer stasis pods. Ah told 'em to bring it back without uh beast 
mode, still uh protoform. Boss, ya still got them DNA from yer old troops? 
Ah found somethin' while ah was lookin' through th' old ship's files. Ah's 
got thinkin' we's need more troops."
